go to the photo section . pic of  diamond+iron oxide detector for radio type evp
   
  doing as much as i can because right now is the most favorable cosmic radio weather for 50 years and it starts dropping off april 6
   
  just got extremely long analogue evp which i am having some experts evaluate.  exhausted though

monki rei <monkiintherabbithole@...> wrote:
          Im getting alot of englishmen as well! Whats your paradigm?

monki rei <monkiintherabbithole@...> wrote:      Well I'll be damned...here comes your ghost again... Hi Ken ;-)
monki

Ken Thomas <kennnthomas2000@...> wrote:
      
  from wikipedia/google , "diamonds and rust"
   
  ".....In the song, Baez recounts an out-of-the-blue phone call from an old lover, which sends her a decade back in time, to a seedy hotel in Greenwich Village. She recalls giving him a pair of cuff links, and summarizes that memories ..."
   
   
  out of the blue call {ive been getting them all week too-males with german accents calling ultra long distance asking for "ruth" sometimes.  1940s background noise.
   
  time traveling future american english voices
   
  dimonds and rust; ok, will keep on that awhile, just to see.
   
  kthomas
